column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bavette's is my new favorite place to go when I'm looking for steak!  The Rib Eye is so delicious
column2: and if you order enough appetizers
column3: is big enough to split two ways (I don't like eating huge hunks of meat).  The oysters are amazing.  The ambiance is quaint and romantic unlike many other Chicago steakhouses.  Service is attentive without being overbearing or rushing.
